extendedInfo.description: This game combines simple gameplay with deep strategy and a realistic vision of climate change. It is a  turn-based strategy game where you must save our civilization. Earth's environment is collapsing and is taking us with it. You need to stop this crisis. Agents are your tools. Deploy them to accomplish your goals and develop advances to improve them.  Greedy, corrupt, and fanatical people stand in your way. Can you overcome them? Can you stabilise the Earth while keeping anarchy at bay?Features- Control activists, scientists and, entrepreneurs. Recruit celebrities, politicians and generals.- Develop advancements to improve agents, develop new abilities and acquire special agents.- Defeat climate deniers and outlaws who stand in your way.

reviews.title: Fun, but should be harder
reviews.comment: Very original concept and setup, but even hard mode is pretty easy.  There should be more deniers and insurgents and emissions should be harder to lower.  I like the way it makes emissions \"lag\", so that your levels from 20 years ago cause problems in the current year.  Its slick interface gives you lots of ways to use your agents without overwhelming you with details.
reviews.author: Arthur Harrill

reviews.title: Game crashes
reviews.comment: The game crashes everytime i click start after selecting the difficulty
reviews.author: tarun rao

reviews.title: ugh
reviews.comment: I paid for the expansion bug I can\'t seem to find it or access it..   very frustrating.  otherwise, i like this game.   I tried to lose and ended up finding a sure fire way to win everytime.
reviews.author: Eric Conrad

reviews.title: Good game to easy
reviews.comment: It was a good but I didn\'t even have to try to win on hard it was kinda a let down...
reviews.author: Karl Sanko

reviews.comment: Idk what the deal is but the app won\'t even open.......
reviews.author: David Sonnier

reviews.title: Good game but it is
reviews.comment: Far to difficult :/
reviews.author: Michael Gilmore

reviews.title: not working
reviews.comment: forced close error at every start
reviews.author: Jan Hovancik

reviews.title: Evil gamer
reviews.comment: Sometimes I laugh maniacally while doing everything wrong on purpose. It doesn\'t take much for it to spiral out of control and when the map starts turning red I pet an imaginary evil cat and twirl an invisible moustache.
reviews.author: Diana Couto

reviews.title: Woah...
reviews.comment: The game offers a deep strategy gameplay with countless possibilities. This is not a text based game, this is a complex strategy game made simple and realistic. Thumbs up!
reviews.author: Dicky Darmawan

reviews.title: Armageddon
reviews.comment: Fun game to play.   Try to save the world from ourselves.
reviews.author: Celeste Viskovic

reviews.comment: Fun to figure out
reviews.author: Andrew Dodd

reviews.title: Tough game
reviews.comment: As a casual gamer I find the normal difficulty too much. Casual level is a good time. Scary message re climate change.
reviews.author: Jen Davies

reviews.title: Good functionality and visually stunning
reviews.comment: Spent a few hours playing it and it seems to work fine on the Galaxy Nexus.  Haven\'t done well to save the world though it is engaging.  I still am having a few issues with the animation not taking total account of when a disaster hits.  Could be my device?  Otherwise very cool game.
reviews.author: Marcus Saroop

reviews.title: Great game.
reviews.comment: I had a great time playing Earth Crisis. Very cool game and very smart - rare combination.
reviews.author: E. Thomas Canton

reviews.title: UI is ugly
reviews.comment: Didn\'t undestand the goal and it was never explained, UI is horrible n text is hard to read.. 5/5 cuz 1/5 lowers ur avg
reviews.author: Pasi Matalam\303\244ki

reviews.title: time consuming
reviews.comment: It had an interesting concept but not enough instructions. By the time I figured out how to play, it was too time consuming. The tech tree is also confusing and the lag time is something that can\'t be overcome no matter what. There\'s also some sort of adware connected to the game.
reviews.author: C Sy

reviews.title: Sorry
reviews.comment: But the game keeps crashing after I select my difficulty. Please fix so I can rate you properly.

reviews.title: Force close
reviews.comment: Every time u open it, it force closes

reviews.comment: Different but awesome
